description: This is a source file for a Next.js React component that implements a detailed page for a connection entity, including subcomponents for containers, items, item details with comments, and raw JSON viewing. It combines client-side data fetching with SWR and Tailwind CSS for styling.

methods.name: envelopeFetcher
methods.description: Fetches data from a URL with unified envelope parsing, handling JSON and error normalization.

methods.name: ContainersList
methods.description: Component fetching and displaying containers related to a connection.

methods.name: ItemsPanel
methods.description: Component for listing, searching, and creating items within a connection container.

methods.name: ItemDetail
methods.description: Component showing details and comments of a selected item, with functionality to add comments.

methods.name: RawJson
methods.description: Component for displaying the raw JSON representation of a connection object.

methods.name: ConnectionDetailPage
methods.description: Main page component displaying connection information and tabs for containers, items, item details, and raw JSON.
